Core:PCProperties.Core:Property: "Each non-host account has a specific number of character slots available on each SkotOS server. At times, however, it is required to modify this limit to allow for e.g. VP characters or other extra characters.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe roster command can be used to read and set the number of extra character slots for accounts.\\r\\n\\r\\nThe default value for all accounts is 0."
"+roster zwoc\\r\\n Checks the number of extra slots the account \\"zwoc\\" has available.\\r\\n\\r\\n+roster zwoc 10\\r\\n Modify the number of extra slots to 10 for the account \\"zwoc\\""
